16: וְהָלַ֗ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>And he went</n> מִדֵּ֤י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>from</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> בְּשָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>to year</n> וְסָבַב֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>in circuit</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>to Bethel</n> וְהַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>and Gilgal</n> וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>and Mizpeh</n> וְשָׁפַט֙ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and judged</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַמְּקוֹמ֖וֹת <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in all those places</n> הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n>
17: וּתְשֻׁבָת֤וֹ <sup>8666 </sup> <n>And his return</n> הָרָמָ֙תָה֙ <sup>7414 </sup> <n>[was] to Ramah</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> בֵּית֔וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>for there [was] his house</n> וְשָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> שָׁפָ֣ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and there he judged</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וַיִּֽבֶן־ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and there he built</n> שָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>an altar</n> לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> פ
